tool_description: Coordinates complex multi-channel price synchronization workflows, managing dependencies, timing, and error handling across the entire process.

sync_scope.description: Synchronization scope: full_catalog, category_based, or product_list

product_categories.description: Product categories to sync (for category_based scope)

specific_products.description: Specific products to sync (for product_list scope)

priority_channels.description: Channels to prioritize in synchronization order

conflict_resolution.description: How to handle conflicts: auto_resolve, manual_review, or skip

batch_size.description: Number of products to process in each batch

retry_attempts.description: Number of retry attempts for failed operations

notification_settings.description: Notification level: none, errors_only, summary, or detailed

error_messages: Invalid sync scope: Use full_catalog, category_based, or product_list.
Missing scope parameters: category_based requires product_categories, product_list requires specific_products.
Invalid sync strategy: Use master_channel, consensus_pricing, or rule_based.
Master channel required: master_channel strategy requires master_channel parameter.
Invalid conflict resolution: Use auto_resolve, manual_review, or skip.
Invalid batch size: batch_size must be greater than 0.
Invalid notification setting: Use none, errors_only, summary, or detailed.
usage: Configure sync_scope, priority_channels, and sync_strategy. Provide additional parameters based on your chosen scope and strategy for comprehensive price synchronization.

sync_status.description: Overall synchronization status: completed, partial, or failed
